70010000075691.description:
About This Game

In Love Too Easily, the main character wakes up with only a partial memory of her night out with friends. Her hangover has left many memories blank, but she knows someone has kissed her! But who…?

Interact with the story by helping the main character make choices, complete tasks in the form of mini-games, and most importantly, find hints about the night out.


[Synopsis]
Just when the main character, Yeonwoo, is getting tired of ambiguous flirts and lukewarm romances, she finds herself waking up to a romantic mystery, the memory of a kiss, but not much more. Who was it, and what else happened last night?

The kiss was good, and Yeonwoo is feeling love-stuck. The problem is that she doesn't know who she kissed. She’s itching to figure it out.

Meet up with the three guys from the night before to get clues.
The romance outcome of Yeonwoo depends on your choices and detective work.

[A story made with your own choices]
Where to go, who to talk to, how to answer, etc., all determine how the story progresses including the hints you can collect.
Depending on how specific the hint is, the success of your reasoning of the situation is determined and can have a significant impact on the ending.
The process of trying to find out who she kissed will change each time you play.
Experience all 11 main endings and other hidden endings!


[Well-timed clicks will have different results]
Watch out for the quick time event (QTE) button appearing in the game!
Each QTE will have a different result depending on your success or failure. A different video sequence will follow depending on the results.


[Mini-games that flow with the story]
Enjoy mini-games that are relevant to the main character and the progress of the story.
The clues obtained when finishing a mini-game can be used later on and might have an impact on the hidden ending.



[You're the one I kissed last night!]
As you overcome the obstacles and complications in figuring out who you’ve kissed, put together the info you have and make a final verdict on which boy it was. Use your reasoning to prove it!

Will Yeonwoo be able to find out who she actually kissed, and will that get her to the ending she wants?
70010000075691.intro: Become the main character's helper, make story choices, collect hints, and clear mini-games. A full-scale mystery romantic comedy interactive movie.
70010000075691.name: Love Too Easily

70070000025524.description:
The Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle brings together two delightful hidden-object games that are all about music, animals, and heartwarming discoveries!

In Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra, explore beautiful, hand-drawn scenes to uncover shy feline musicians. Each hidden cat adds a new instrument, letting you create unique melodies as you build your cat orchestra!

In Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra, the fun continues with adorable puppies hiding in various vibrant settings. Find these bashful musician dogs to unlock more sounds and craft your own doggy symphony!

Enjoy relaxing gameplay as you search, find, and build your musical ensembles in these cozy, animal-themed adventures! Perfect for hidden-object fans and anyone who loves cute animals and soothing melodies.
70070000025524.intro: Find shy musician cats and dogs in this charming bundle! Enjoy cozy hidden-object gameplay as you discover adorable animals and create your own musical mix!
70070000025524.name: Hidden Shy Cats & Dogs Bundle

70010000046032.description:
Leif's Adventure is a captivating 2D action-adventure game centered on friendship and teamwork. A young boy, never meant to be a hero, discovers that brute strength isn't always the solution. Guide two distinct characters through the adventure of their lifetimes, leveraging their unique abilities to defeat the evil forces of the Netherworld.

Key Features:
* Exploration and Adventure: Navigate through a richly diverse world, exploring six unique realms filled with side-quests, hidden treasures and colorful characters, each with their own background story. Battle a variety of creatures, powerful secret bosses, and other deadly adversaries. Use Ghost's supernatural talents alongside Leif's physical abilities to delve into the deepest reaches of each realm.

* Singleplayer and Co-op: Play Leif's Adventure in single-player mode or switch to local co-op mode at any time and play together with a friend. Leif excels in fighting, jumping, and running, while Ghost can find hidden areas, activate ethereal objects and platforms, collect items, and stun enemies.

* Extensive Weapon Selection: Equip Leif with a wide range of weapons including swords, hammers, axes, and spears. Collect and use weapons dropped by enemies. Each weapon is imbued with unique elemental abilities like fire, ice, and electricity.

* Skill Progression: Enhance Leif's abilities with a variety of skills such as meteor-strike, air attack, and weapon throws. Upgrade weapons, including his signature hammer, and maximize his health.

* Hand-Drawn Art: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world with unique hand-drawn graphics inspired by Nordic folklore.
70010000046032.intro: Join Leif and his loyal sidekick Ghost as they combine their strengths to overcome the sinister forces of the Netherworld.
70010000046032.name: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero

70010000077898.description:
Dive into a frosty world packed with snow-filled challenges and chilly adventures designed to bring warmth and excitement to your cold winter days. From snowball battles to icy races, there’s something for everyone to enjoy solo or with family and friends.

Take on the leaderboard to see who can claim the highest score by challenging your friends in the multiplayer mode — up to 8 players can join by simply passing around one controller. With a delightful mix of arcade-inspired games like Tetrice, Polar Cross, Frostbreaker, and Winter Match 3, this collection offers countless hours of fun.

WINTER WONDERLAND BY TRAIN – Hop on a magical train ride that takes you through snowy landscapes, stopping at every station for a new game.

WINTER-THEMED GAME MODES – From high-speed bobsled relays to precision snowball throws, each game captures the festive spirit of the winter season.

ADORABLE CHARACTERS – Choose from 8 unique, winter-loving characters to add personality to every game.

MULTIPLAYER FUN FOR ALL – Play alone or with up to 8 players by passing a single controller — challenge your friends and set the highest scores!

Games Included:
• Bobsleigh Relay
• Chilly Slices
• Snowball Blast
• Tetrice
• Arctic Circle Skater
• Frostbreaker
• Snowdrift Racers
• Winterpong
• And many more!
70010000077898.intro: Get ready for endless winter fun with a fantastic collection of arcade-inspired games!
70010000077898.name: Winter Games Collection

70010000088027.description:
Fulfill Your Wish
You’ve been brought back with a single purpose: revenge. Attack the villages ravaged by the sinister and enslaving “Apocalypse Bringers”, who have plunged the world into chaos, and liberate them from their tyranny.

Stealthy Action and Multiple Tools
Use your bow and arrow to eliminate enemies from a distance. You can distract foes with an arrow and attack them from behind, or wait and confront them head-on with lethal axe strikes.

Confront the “Apocalypse Bringers”
Liberate villages from their control and face their bosses. Each boss has unique mechanics that will alter your gameplay. Who knows? Maybe you can even save some of them.

Immersive Open World
Explore the desert’s stories, complete missions for upgrades, and uncover the darkest secrets, shrouded in blood and sand.
70010000088027.intro: After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance and claim your revenge
70010000088027.name: Brothers in Hell

70010000088060.description:
For some mysterious reason, the protagonist finds himself in sealed rooms wherever he goes.
Seemingly simple at first, solving the puzzles delivers an unmatched sense of satisfaction.

    Episode 3
This adventure takes place in everyone's dream destination—a tropical island resort!
The protagonist arrives for a getaway with their uncle, ready to soak up the sun. But on the way to the hotel shuttle, something goes wrong and he finds himself locked in his room, unable to leave!
Far from home in a secluded corner of paradise, this escape drama is about to unfold.

Featuring fully refined graphics, immersive interactive elements, and various play modes with multiple endings, this game promises a unique experience for every player. With memo and camera functions at your fingertips, it’s designed to be easy for beginners and exciting for veterans alike. Dive into the world of simple yet addictive puzzle-solving with this thrilling escape game!
70010000088060.intro:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 3: Escape from The Southern Resort!
70010000088060.name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep3:The Southern Resort

70010000088120.description:
Kaimyou is ...

Kaimyou is a posthumous name given to a deceased person in Buddhist tradition, particularly in Japan. It is used during memorial services and placed on the Ihai (memorial tablet) in honor of the deceased. The Kaimyou represents the individual’s spiritual journey and is usually bestowed by a Buddhist priest. The name often reflects the person’s virtues or spiritual aspirations, and its creation follows specific religious customs. The use of Kaimyou is common in rituals surrounding death, mourning, and the afterlife, and it plays a significant role in the commemoration of ancestors.

This software automatically generates Kaimyou (posthumous Buddhist names).
*Please note that while the term 'Kaimyou' is used as a general reference, in the app, the name may be referred to as 'Houmyou,' 'Hougou,' 'Myougou,' 'Okurina,' or other terms depending on the Buddhist sect.

This comprehensive Kaimyou editing tool is suitable not only for those who wish to receive a Kaimyou for themselves or their family members, but also for use by Buddhist priests. Additionally, since Japanese religions are tolerant, the app can be used by individuals from other religions without any issue. Even if you simply want a cool Kanji alias, you are welcome to use it.



Main Features

■ Automatic Kaimyou Generation
By simply answering questions and inputting the following profile information—name, gender, age, sect, level of faith, occupation, hobbies, skills, and motto—the Kaimyou will be automatically generated.

■ Flexible Editing
You can freely modify the automatically generated Kaimyou. Changes can be made at the Kanji level while checking their meanings, allowing you to receive a Kaimyou that meets your preferences.

■ Kaimyou Certificate Issuance
Once you have your favorite Kaimyou, you can issue a certificate. The certificate can be saved in an album, enabling you to transfer it to other devices or print it for use.

■ As an Ihai
By switching your Nintendo Switch™ to tabletop mode, it can be used as an Ihai. The Ihai is a memorial tablet that represents the deceased.

■ Temple Member Management
The app includes a temple member management feature, allowing you to manage multiple individuals’ names, ages, sects, and more. This makes it highly recommended for clergy who need to manage Kaimyou for multiple people.

■ Supported Sects
・Jōdo-shū / SeizanJōdo-shū / JōdoShin-shū / ShinshūTakada-Ha
・Nichiren-shū / NichirenSei-shū
・Sōtō-shū / Rinzai-shū / Ōbaku-shū
・Shingon-shū / Tendai-shū / YūzūNembutsu-shū
・Ji-shū
・Ritsu-shū
・Shinto
・No religion / Unknown
70010000088120.intro: This is a tool that automatically generates, manages, and edits Kaimyou. It can also issue Kaimyou certificates and save them in an album, and it can be used as an Ihai.
70010000088120.name: Kaimyou Maker

70010000090710.description:
Super Spy Raccoon is an imagining of a stealth game as an early 80's Arcade Classic! Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to acquire all classified documents as you venture deeper and deeper into enemy territory. Hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to top score?

What to expect

- 5 single-screen levels that loop until a kill screen!
- Challenging yet addictive arcade style fun
- Short wait-times to get right back into the action!
- Unlockable suit colors to match your sense of style
- Local and global leaderboards for increased bragging rights!
70010000090710.intro: A retro arcade throwback where you hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to top score?
70010000090710.name: Super Spy Raccoon

70050000050032.description: Prepare to embark on a tropical adventure with Monster Jam™ Showdown - Aloha Expansion. This DLC pack features a new environment with 6 new tracks and 1 new arena, plus 5 fearless trucks.
70050000050032.name: Monster Jam™ Showdown - Aloha Expansion

70010000080475.description:
Dive into the vibrant world of an enthralling anime idol dance game that invites you to join the journey of nine unique idols, each with their own dreams, outfits, favorite locations and favorite songs. 
In this captivating adventure, you'll have the chance to dance alongside your favorite characters through 35 mesmerizing levels, each offering two distinct difficulties to challenge and delight players of all skill levels.
As you step into the glittering shoes of each idol, you'll dance your way through a variety of enchanting stages, from the dazzling streets of Paris to the serene beauty of a starlit night on a space station. With every beat and rhythm, immerse yourself in the thrilling gameplay that combines intuitive controls with exhilarating music tracks, ensuring every performance feels as thrilling as a live concert.
But the rewards are as sweet as the journey! 
With each level you conquer, unlock breathtaking images of your character dancing, capturing their spirit and passion in stunning visuals that celebrate your progress. These exclusive images not only serve as tokens of your achievements but also deepen your connection with the characters, offering glimpses into their lives and dreams.
It is a journey through a world full of fun, dancing, and anime, wrapped in a dazzling package of music, and exciting visuals. Whether you're a seasoned rhythm game aficionado or a newcomer eager to explore the world of anime idols, this game promises an unforgettable experience, blending the thrill of performance with the heartwarming tales of ambition, friendship, and success. 
Join us on this dazzling adventure, and let the rhythm lead the way to stardom!
70010000080475.intro: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.
70010000080475.name: Anime Dance-Off - Around the World

70010000088282.description:
Thrills and Speed for Ultimate Excitement! Oh no! A few people have been left behind in an underwater city. If they aren’t rescued quickly, they’ll be blown up by mines or missiles. You must lift them to the surface on the rescue ship and reach the waiting mothership as fast as possible. 

This is a shooting game released in 1983 in Japan. The player controls a rescue ship to embark on a mission to save lives from the underwater city.

Between the mothership and the underwater city, obstacles are placed, and occasionally, missiles will be launched towards the underwater city. To make matters worse, you can only transport one person at a time, making the rescue operation anything but easy.

Skillfully avoid obstacles, counter missile attacks with your barrier, and don't forget to keep an eye on the remaining fuel for your rescue ship. If you manage to bring five survivors back to the mothership, you clear the stage. Despite its simple rules, this game offers a fast-paced and thrilling experience that keeps you on your toes.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000088282.intro: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!
70010000088282.name: EGGCONSOLE AQUA POLIS SOS MSX

70010000088933.description:
COLLECT THE GIFTS AND SAVE CHRISTMAS!
Santa's in trouble! It's Christmas Eve, and the presents are missing. Help Santa recover the gifts and save the day, so he can deliver them to children all over the world just in time for Christmas morning!

EXPLORE 20 UNIQUE LEVELS!
Travel across 20 distinct levels, each filled with fun challenges and hidden surprises. To complete a level, gather every last gift and unlock the magic portal that will take you to the next location! Can you find them all out?

HELP SANTA SAVE CHRISTMAS!
Play as Santa Claus in this exciting 3D platformer adventure. Navigate through festive environments, collecting all the gifts scattered across the North Pole and beyond! Join Santa on his Christmas adventure and help him deliver all the presents!
70010000088933.name: Save Christmas With Santa

70010000089236.description:
Embrace the thrill of the chase and become a dedicated officer in "Police Simulator" a captivating simulation game that places you in the heart of a bustling metropolis.
Key Features:
1. Become a Guardian of the City: Choose your character and embark on a challenging yet rewarding career in law enforcement.
2. Patrol the Streets: Cruise the city in iconic police cars or navigate tight spaces on a Segway, ensuring no corner escapes your vigilance.
3. Enforce the Law: Make arrests, issue fines for parking violations, and maintain order on the roads, upholding justice and safety.
4. Conduct Thorough Investigations: Search individuals, uncover illegal items, and contribute to a safer environment for all citizens.
5. Embrace the Hero Within: Be the frontline defender against crime, protecting the city from harm and becoming a symbol of hope for the community.
6. Test Your Skills: Step into the shoes of an NYPD officer and put your determination and professionalism to the test in diverse situations.
"Police Simulator" provides you with a unique experience in the world of police service, where your determination and professionalism will be front and center. Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become an unwavering guardian of order in NYPD City?
70010000089236.intro: Be the Hero Who Protects: Your City Needs You!
70010000089236.name: Cop Officers: Police Simulator of NYPD City

70010000087059.description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor, where each wave can bring new adventures or deadly threats. Stranded on a fragile raft with only a hook, you must gather resources, battle fierce predators, and transform your raft into a secure floating haven. Survive alone or with friends on this treacherous ocean quest!
Key Features:
	•	Survive Shark Attacks: Defend yourself against relentless shark threats. Fortify your raft and stay one step ahead!
	•	Resource Crafting: Collect resources to build essential tools and upgrade your raft into a secure oasis.
	•	Hook Mastery: Use your hook to snag drifting debris and vital supplies—each catch is a step toward survival.
	•	Raft Expansion: Upgrade and personalize your floating base with new sections and decorative touches.
	•	Fishing & Cooking: Catch fish and cook meals to stay energized on your journey.
	•	Water Filtration: Convert seawater into drinkable fresh water to keep hydrated.
	•	Island Exploration: Discover new islands, unearth civilization remnants, and gather valuable resources.
Will you survive the dangers of the ocean and build a thriving sanctuary, or will the waves claim your fate? The ocean adventure of a lifetime awaits in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor!
70010000087059.intro: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.
70010000087059.name: Float Survival Simulator - Ocean Survivor

70010000088812.description:
Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and build amazing structures for your blocks. Sounds easy? Think again! – you only have so much room on your bench, and if you overfill it, it's game over!

Every level gives you new challenges to solve, but don't worry – you have power-ups to help! Undo a move, reshuffle blocks, or add extra bench space when you're in a tough spot. Earn coins along the way to customize your blocks and make your diorama totally unique!

For an extra challenge, try "Bus Mode" – the classic Block Jam experience with a colorful twist! Match blocks to fill color-coded buses and watch them roll out. Complete all buses in a level, and you'll earn even more power-ups and coins to help you on your journey!

Features:
- Match and Win: Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and avoid overfilling your bench.
- Limited Bench: Use your bench wisely – a full bench means game over!
- Bus Mode: Fill color-matched buses to clear levels and earn extra power-ups and coins!
- Fun Power-Ups: Use undo, magnet, reshuffle, or expand your bench to escape tricky situations.
- Build Your Diorama: Collect bricks to create unique structures in your very own block-populated diorama.
- Customize Your Blocks: Use coins earned in-game to give your diorama blocks unique and fun looks.

Jump into Block Jam – where every move is a step closer to clearing the board, personalizing your world, and mastering each challenge!
70010000088812.intro: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!
70010000088812.name: Block Jam

70010000089178.description:
In Car Cops, you’re more than just a regular cop – you’re the sharp-eyed officer who never misses a clue! Patrol the streets, pull over suspicious drivers, and dive into the action-packed life of a police officer. Each stop could lead to a dangerous criminal, a desperate chase, or someone in need of urgent help.

Check IDs, inspect faces, and scan every detail to decide if the driver is innocent or up to no good. From cutting open seat cushions, to defusing bombs in car trunks, you’ll need to stay alert and rely on your instincts and gear. And when a wanted criminal crosses your path, prepare for a heart-pounding chase – and don’t hesitate to take action when it’s time to draw your weapon!

But it’s not just about the bad guys – you’re there for the people, too. Some drivers might need CPR, others may have a car fire or a breakdown that only you can handle!

Features:
- Detailed Vehicle Inspections: Check IDs, match faces, and look for suspicious items in cars.
- Intense Car Chases: Follow criminals on the run in fast-paced pursuits across town.
- Showdowns with Criminals: Be ready for action when criminals fight back – take cover and return fire to stay safe.
- Professional Police Tools: Use x-rays, slice through seat fabric, and explore every corner of the car for hidden surprises.
- Deliver Justice: Bring suspects to court, where you decide if they’re guilty or innocent.
- Emergency Responder Role: Jump into action, offering CPR, putting out car fires, or helping with breakdowns on the road.

Think you can spot a criminal at first glance? Put your instincts to the test!
70010000089178.intro: From traffic stops to high-speed chases – think you’ve got what it takes to keep the streets safe?
70010000089178.name: Car Cops

70010000089586.description: Face a deadly journey with a brave cat! In each level of this adventure, spikes and traps demand insane precision to be overcome. You only have one chance, so if you fail, start over. Master the timing and prove your skill in this game where only the most persistent reach the end.
70010000089586.name: CatCat

70050000053424.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Teddy Bear outfit
- Harley outfit
- Superhero Girl outfit
- Ice Queen outfit
- Maid outfit
- Pilot outfit
- Rabbit Ears outfit
- extra 5000 cash to buy furniture and make your home the perfect place to relax after a hard day at work

Unlock 7 unique outfits for your police officer, perfect for every undercover mission or just adding flair to your beat!
70050000053424.intro: Dress up on the job and make your home your own!
70050000053424.name: Car Cops: Drip Patrol

70050000053434.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- 6 fancy hats for the blocks that live on your dioramas!
- 15 of each power-up for an easier time!

Get ready to match, clear, and decorate with flair!
70050000053434.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and stylish hats!
70050000053434.name: Block Jam: Fancy Power

70050000053435.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- 6 cute hats for the blocks that live on your dioramas!
- 15 of each power-up for an easier time!

Get ready to match, clear, and decorate with flair!
70050000053435.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and lovely hats!
70050000053435.name: Block Jam: Cute Power

70010000083325.description:
【Story Mode】
One complete cinematic episode ( x 18 chapters) with a theme of between beauty and ugliness
Use darkly humorous skills to solve difficult social problems in a surreal and comical way.
The story eventually arrives at a forbidden place in the universe, where an epic climax awaits against an ancient demon that manipulates the blood, memories, time, and dimensions of humankind.
・Multiple endings
・Many secret elements
・High difficulty challenge stage

【Character customization】
100 kinds of cats & dogs, and lot of colors to choose from. Dress up cosplay and go on an adventure!
・Player strengthening and development


【Traveling Mode】 (1 ～ 6 min / play, casual rogue-light)
◎<Tourism> (Relax, Exploring, Leisurely Play)
Travel around the world in a relaxed mood, saving animals, searching heartful people and making beautiful souls bloom!
Enjoy the local traditional food and music while thinking about the history of each country.
●<Exorcism> (Exhilarating action battle; Lv.1 ～ Lv.5 High difficulty)
The ego, ignorance, and weakness of the mind that stirs within human beings is clothed in cruelty and attacks as violence! Exorcise the evil that infests society and save the community!

【Festival Mode】 (* bonus content)
■<Board Game>
Become the warden of Purgatory, prevent the escape and invasion of the 12 sinners, and become the guardian gods of the nations of the world (Turn-based x Tower Defense x Cards x Rogue Lite)
◆<Card Deck>
Unlock your favorite cards from over 1,000 cards and create and build your own deck of damage cards by freely dabbling with your own ideas (physical, mental and quantum damage)
▼<City Build>
Become a creative pastry chef in the heavenly realm and feed mankind with delicious and funny civilized sweets and alter the history of the region in a messy way!
70010000083325.intro: A cosmic horror comedy, your buddy goes around the world
70010000083325.name: Paw Paw Destiny

70010000089502.description:
Join the Celebration! In Meow Moments: Celebrating Renewal and Romance, cats and friends come together to commemorate special occasions in two vibrant scenes that capture the warmth of new beginnings and heartfelt connections. Every corner is filled with details that spark the imagination, inspiring you to create your own stories around the lively moments you find.

Begin with the electrifying New Year’s Eve on Rio’s famous Copacabana Beach, where stunning artwork by Katia Numakura brings the festivities to life. With fireworks lighting up the sky, crowds of cats and friends enjoy the vibrant beach atmosphere. 
Then, step into a cozy Valentine's Day scene set in a beautiful, romantic square where couples and friends celebrate love and friendship.

Features:

- Cats and Friends: Find delightful characters amid two detailed scenes, each full of unique stories waiting to be uncovered.
- Balloon-Popping Fun: Enjoy relaxing gameplay as you pop balloons across the scenes—a bit of fun with every search!
- Rich Details: Explore beautifully crafted illustrations filled with festive decorations, bringing each celebration to life.
- Atmospheric Soundtrack: Get immersed in the mood with Tatyana Jacques’ exclusive soundtracks that match each scene, from beachy bossa nova to romantic melodies.
- Family-Friendly Fun: With cozy and entertaining gameplay suited for all ages, it’s an experience everyone can enjoy together. Don’t be surprised if the whole family starts pointing out the cats at once!

Join the cats and celebrate renewal and romance in this heartwarming adventure, perfect for cozy game lovers!
70010000089502.intro: Join cute cats in festive scenes! Find feline friends and pop balloons as you explore New Year's on Copacabana beach and share sweet moments for Valentine’s Day.
70010000089502.name: Meow Moments: Celebrating Renewal & Romance

70010000045869.description:
Love cooking games? Manage 9 distinct kitchens, craft over 500 dishes, and rise to culinary stardom across 1000+ fast-paced levels in Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire. Customize your home, unlock trophies, and bring the heat!

From street food to sushi, each kitchen will test your time-management skills as you work to satisfy impatient customers and hit your goals. But it’s not all about the kitchens—customize and upgrade your home to showcase your achievements, unlock trophies, and build a true empire!

Perfect for players of all ages, this game offers fast-paced fun that’s easy to pick up, but tough to master. Can you handle the heat and build your own cooking empire?

Key Features:

9 Unique Cuisines: Master a range of cooking styles and menus.
500+ Dishes: A global selection of recipes to perfect.
1000+ Levels: Challenge yourself with increasingly complex kitchens.
Home Customization: Upgrade your furniture and earn trophies to showcase your progress.
Fun & Fast-Paced: Simple to play, with endless hours of culinary excitement!
70010000045869.intro: Master the Kitchen and Build Your Empire!
70010000045869.name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire

70010000079836.description:
Soar to the top scores while hanging out with the world’s most rad grandmas in "Airborne Grannies".

These ladies in their sixties are not just passing time—they're setting records and redefining "cool" with each jump.

It’s a game that mixes the nostalgia of arcade classics with a fresh, uproarious twist. 

Eager for a challenge? These grannies sure are, inviting you to a riot of excitement and laughter.

Who says the golden years are for slowing down?
70010000079836.intro: Care Plan: Defying Gravity and Age
70010000079836.name: Airborne Grannies

70010000088650.description: Tombs of Myra is a turn-based puzzle dungeon crawler game.
70010000088650.intro: Descend into the cursed tombs of Myra and free the souls of ancient warriors.
70010000088650.name: Tombs Of Myra

70010000088806.description:
Step into the role of your favorite heroes and villains from across the history of Star Trek and embark on an epic space adventure to control the mysterious Nexus. Battle to save all of existence in Star Trek’s official strategy-based RPG! 

PREPARE FOR ADVENTURE 
Dive into the action with characters spanning the entire Star Trek universe! Take command of the U.S.S. Artemis and recruit a team of legendary Star Trek characters as you embark on daring missions, experience epic turn-based combat, and make choices that influence the game’s entire story. 

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM
Ever wanted to master Spock’s Vulcan nerve pinch or battle with Worf’s deadly bat’leth? Now is your chance! Recruit and command over 70 iconic characters from the Star Trek universe including Kirk, Spock, Picard, Janeway, Data, Burnham, Pike, and many more! Send your Star Trek team on critical missions that will test your crew’s skills and ingenuity. Earn special rewards by completing collections of characters based on the Star Trek shows they appeared in or the traits they possess. Plus, you can earn combat bonuses by using multiple Star Trek characters from the same collection in battle. 

TAKE COMMAND OF THE U.S.S. ARTEMIS
Captain the U.S.S. Artemis and shape the fate of the cosmos! Choose your crew strategically. Each Star Trek character has their own specific skills and abilities to help you outwit, overpower and overcome your enemies. Every decision you make could be the difference between triumph and defeat. Take command, Captain – the galaxy awaits your leadership!

NAVIGATE AN IMMERSIVE UNIVERSE
Dive into the exquisitely crafted 3D world of Star Trek Legends! Explore beautifully rendered 3D worlds and interact with fully realized animated characters in this epic Star Trek RPG. 

Get ready to boldly go where no one has gone before in Star Trek: Legends. Your interstellar adventure awaits!
70010000088806.intro: Captain - The fate of the universe is in your hands!
70010000088806.name: Star Trek: Legends

70050000053553.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Picard (old) 
- K'ehleyr

Increase your power level and save the world!
70050000053553.intro: Invite new commanders on board and build the perfect team!
70050000053553.name: Star Trek: Legends - Command DLC

- Number one

Increase your power level and save the world!
